parameter.name: requesterId
parameter.description: User ID of the requester.

parameter.name: email
parameter.description: Email address of the requester.

parameter.name: facebookId
parameter.description: Facebook ID of the requester.

parameter.name: phone
parameter.description: Phone number of the requester.

parameter.name: twitterId
parameter.description: Twitter handle of the requester.

parameter.name: name
parameter.description: Name of the requester.

parameter.name: subject
parameter.description: Subject of the ticket.

parameter.name: type
parameter.description: Helps categorize the ticket according to the different kinds of issues your support team deals with.

parameter.name: status
parameter.description: Status of the ticket.

parameter.name: priority
parameter.description: Priority of the ticket.

parameter.name: description
parameter.description: HTML content of the ticket.

parameter.name: responderId
parameter.description: ID of the agent to whom the ticket has been assigned.

parameter.name: ccEmails
parameter.description: Email address added in the 'cc' field of the incoming ticket email.

parameter.name: customFields
parameter.description: Key value pairs containing the names and values of custom fields.

parameter.name: emailConfigId

parameter.description: Timestamp that denotes when the first response is due.

parameter.description: ID of the group to which the ticket has been assigned.

parameter.description: ID of the product to which the ticket is associated.
